meanings: automatic action[movement, operation], automatism, ―하다 move automatically, act[work] by itself
electronic transfer, automatic withdrawal, (Brit) direct debit

examples.korean: We pay all our bills by direct debit. 발음듣기 우리는 모든 공과금을 자동 이체로 납부한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We pay all our bills by direct debit. 발음

examples.korean: All our rooms have direct dialling telephones. 발음듣기 저희의 모든 객실에는 자동 전화가 설치되어 있습니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: All our rooms have direct dialling telephones. 발음

examples.korean: Automation meant the loss of many factory jobs. 발음듣기 자동화는 공장에서 일자리가 많이 없어짐을 의미했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Automation meant the loss of many factory jobs. 발음

examples.korean: Any form of cheating means automatic disqualification. 발음듣기 어떤 형태든 부정행위는 자동 실격을 의미한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Any form of cheating means automatic disqualification. 발음

examples.korean: The oven burners reignite automatically if blown out. 발음듣기 이 오븐식 버너는 불이 꺼지면 자동으로 재점화가 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The oven burners reignite automatically if blown out. 발음
